text: @NC_Governor From upstate South Carolina, THANK YOU!!! You are saving us from yet more sickness and misery, with what will already be a miserable summer for our area 😭 The Trump admin has convinced their followers that COVID19 is a hoax, and this sociopathic behavior of Trump’s is why.
